app_name: Groups Control Groups Messenger Apps Chatous Chat with new people
app_description: Chatous allows you to chat with people from all over the world about the topics you care about. The connections you make through Chatous can be rich and real stay in touch with the people you enjoy talking with and bring the conversation to life through photo sharing. FEATURES: Find people interested in topics you care about by posting or selecting a hashtag. You ll be connected with someone who chose the same tag. Messages conversations and all other activity on Chatous are seamlessly synced to our web platform www.chatous.com experience the freedom of true cross platform compatibility! Easily share disappearing photos videos and audio messages! Tap the icon in a chat to quickly share a moment with a friend. Share your favorite YouTube videos in a chat
